title: Threatened to be hacked
body:
Well one day I was logging onto my account to play a game with my friends while I was waiting on them to login out of no were it said my account has been logged in from another account i got really confused to I logged back in and I was back on my account so then later when me and my friends were in queue I get a message saying why did you login to my account I got really confused then and said "what do you mean your account its my account" then he said no this is my account and I asked "ok what is my password and all that" and he got the password right to I asked how did u get my password and what he said was "this is my job this is what i do". The I was like wtf how did he even get my password and all that then he said "do u want account back" and of course i said yes but then he said something that really got me confused and pissed, he said "give me rp then I will give your account back". After that a while later i messaged him back saying ok i'll give you rp just to buy time so I could try to chage my password or something, so then i tried to change my password and then i see it is changed to his email so i couldnt even change my password which really pissed me off. After that i said ok give me like 3 to 4 weeks and i will get your rp so he gave my that time so i did everything to try to get my account back someway or some how but nothing so i wanted to know if you guys could just change my password or something because i spent money and time on this game and i dont want it to go away so if you guys could just do something to get my account back that would mean everything.

Thanks

replies.body: This sounds like a shady situation, and I don't recommend giving in to someone who trying to hold your account for ransom.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can help you regain access to the account.  It's also important that you go over our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide for safety practices and making sure your accounts outside of league are safe as well.  We'll respond asap!
